version_description:
- Added server time in Settings
- Optimized game performance
- Add error notice when recharge failed

What‘s new:
- Increased Adventurer caps
- Increased Building caps
- Unlock new maps
- Add new dungeons
- Add new sidequests

Changelog:
- Added a confirmation when salvaging or sacrificing unique equipment and loot
- Unique equipment cannot be salvaged with Batch Salvage
- Adjusted the tactics of Illusion Assassin
- Added sort function for Equipment and Loot
- Change Set will now change Loot as well
- Win the first 10 matches in Arena to get Honor Fragment x1 daily
- Added Total Arena Wins notification in Daily Task
- Tavern, Equipment and Loot caps upgrades are now available
- Resources storage caps upgrade again

What's new:
- Increased the Tavern caps to Lv.45
- Increased the maximum forging level to 100
- Increased the craftsmen caps to 250
- Increased the Adventurer's caps to Lv.90
- Added a new class Bishop
- Unlocked the new map Southern Sea
- Unlocked the new map Dark Moon Abyss

What's new:
- Significantly reduced Soul costs for 5-star charactrers
- Language: Added Japanese

What's new:
- Unlocked the new system Ruins
- Lost Spirit will appear on the map
- Unlocked The Ruined Temple in the Sanctuary
- Changed the image of some monsters

What's new:
- Unlocked the new system Guild
- Unlocked the Dark Rift to floor 56

- Characters’ Optimization
-* Added two new characters: Ancient Elf Sage and Nimbus Assassin
-* Added a new transfer class for Dream Weaver
-* Optimized some characters’ abilities

- Other Optimization
-* Added new options of highest priority target in the tactics of the adventurers
-* Added a button to equip or unequip at once
-* Added sort function for adventurers in the Tavern
-* Added Resistance’s effect on debuffs on the stats page

New Contents:
- Arcane Falling Object appears in the Wilderness.
- Added the function of Team Set.
- Added Broken Guardian into the Temple of the Soul.
- Added Layer 61 in the Dark Rift.
- Added a series of side quests of finding Guardian's fragments (Need to defeat the Broken Guardian first).
- Added a transfer class for Blademaster: Swordtitan.
- Added a new character: Swordsman of Star.
- Added Lost Spirits in the Everlook Temple.
- Able to retreat faster during some battles.
- A strange iron gate appears in the Illusion Forest.
Contents:
- Toris, Merchant has some new stocks after you complete the main quest in Everlook Temple.
- Increased caps of equipment and loots.
- Relic Equipment won't appear in the list of upgrading loot.
- Optimized the description of Loot Boxes.
- Increased Blademaster's chance to deal Armor Penetration.
- Increased damage of Violent Double-edge of Swordsman.
- Enhanced some Relic forged in the Workshop.
- Enhanced Tranquility of Legendary Mage.
- Optimized the color display of magic damage.
- Can reforge the equipment in the character panel.
- Can change the tactics by long pressing the characters during the battle. (Unavailable in the arena)
- Added 5 craftsmen.
- Increased resource caps.

1st Anniversary version-New Contents:
- Unlocked Everlook Temple.
- Able to exchange Philosopher's Stone for transfer items with Sage in Red Robe.
- Unlocked layer 8 of Ruins.
- Able to upgrade guild level to Lvl.6.

Optimizations:
- Optimized some characters' appearance.
- Optimized the main scene.
- Added new scene "Hope". (Unlock after defeating the Old God)

Other Contents:
- Doubled the income of crucible while reducing its time in half. (New)
- Chairman will be dismissed if being offline more than 200 hours.
